pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid "Tricks": Kamen Rider Genm (2016, web series)$(br2)Used to access Genm's $(l:ex_aid/riders/genm#blade)Blade Gamer Level 2$(/l)
